name: Chromosphere (irwatts)
description:
Created by Ian Reichert-Watts and Jonathan Pollard in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50
Theme: Delay the Inevitable

The sun is dying. You are an A.I. with only one mission: Keep reigniting the Sun!

Wade through a myriad of controls to maintain the equilibrium of the collapsing star, but don’t get distracted! Even the relative safety of your Asteroid base command pod won’t save you from the cold darkness of a sunless sky.
